name: In Tenebris, Monstra
description: "Beyond the veil, I see them there. Waiting for me. Hungering in the dark. Covetous of such great wonders. They call out to me. I will answer."

name: Paradeigma
description:
humans are petty, irrational creatures that live for fleeting moments, fight, and die of some absurd act.
but you have realized the passion of your ascension.
are you ready to become something more?
